scripts.prebuild:all: echo üßπ Limpiando... && npm run clean:db-resource && if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && if exist electron\resources\api rmdir /s /q electron\resources\api && if exist release rmdir /s /q release
scripts.build:angular: echo üî® Compilando Angular... && ng build --configuration production --base-href ./ && echo ‚úÖ Angular compilado
scripts.build:backend: echo üî® Compilando Backend... && cd ..\backend && npm run build && echo ‚úÖ Backend compilado
scripts.package:backend: echo üì¶ Empaquetando Backend... && cd ..\backend && npx pkg dist/main.js --target node20-win-x64 --output ../frontend/electron/resources/backend-win.exe && echo ‚úÖ Backend empaquetado
scripts.verify:files: echo üîç Verificando archivos... && dir dist\frontend\browser\index.html && dir electron\resources\backend-win.exe && echo ‚úÖ Archivos verificados
scripts.copy:backend: echo üì¶ Copiando Backend a Electron... && xcopy /E /I /Y ..\backend\dist electron\resources\api && echo ‚úÖ Backend copiado
scripts.build:all: npm run prebuild:all && npm run build:angular && npm run build:backend && npm run package:backend && npm run verify:files
